src.util.augmentation_util module¶

This module provides methods, to perform affine transformations on images to augment a data set. Methods have been implemented as proposed by Sebastian Sudholt.


src.util.augmentation_util.homography_augm(img, random_limits=(0.9, 1.1))[source]¶

Creates an augmentation by computing a homography from three points in the image to three randomly generated points

src.util.augmentation_util.scale(img, w=None, h=None)[source]¶

Scaling of an image. If width and height are not defined, the image is not transformed. If only one is defined, the original ratio is kept while resizing. If both are defined, the image is resized to the specified width and height.

Parameters

  • img – image to be scaled

  • w – new width

  • h – new height

Returns

scaled image

src.util.augmentation_util.visualiz_homography_augm(img, random_limits=(0.9, 1.1))[source]¶

Creates an augmentation by computing a homography from three points in the image to three randomly generated points
